1406590.name: Fantasy Grounds - Boomsticks'n'Thunderguns!
1406590.description:
Boomsticks'n'Thunderguns!

A pack of gunpower fanatics, gunslingers, and adventurers for your games.

This product includes:
  • Dwarf_Gunslinger_Repeater
  • Dwarf_Miner_Boomstick
  • Dwarf_PirateCaptain_AxeMusket
  • Dwarf_Tunnelkeeper_MusketHammer
  • Gnome_TinkerGuard_Dualpistol
  • Gnome_TinkerGuard_Gadgetmusket
  • Gnome_TinkerGuard_HammerGun
  • Half_Orc_SteppeHunter_AxeMusket
  • Half_Orc_SteppeHunter_Scattergun
  • HalfElf_Borderguard_BucklerGun
  • HalfElf_Borderguard_Drakefire
  • HalfElf_Borderguard_Riflemen
  • HalfElf_Borderguard_Sword&Pistol
  • Halfling_Bellguard_Musket
  • Halfling_farmkeeper
  • Halfling_farmrebel
  • Human_Gunslinger_DualPistol
  • Human_Gunslinger_PistolRapier
  • Human_Gunslinger_Rifle
  • Human_Roadwarrior_Gunzerker
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
